message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe we can find a price that suits both of us better. I am willing to pay $750000 for the product.

I understand that you're looking to negotiate a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still feel that the product's value aligns more closely with a price closer to $800000. I would like to propose a price of $850000.

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $925000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand your position, and I respect the value you place on the product. However, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to $825000. This would allow me to stay within my budget while still acquiring a valuable item.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $825000. I'm willing to make one last concession, and I'll sell it to you for $900000, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget constraints. Based on our previous discussions, I believe we can agree on a price of $875000 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. Considering our previous discussions, I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $987500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
